solution_line_template: Since Dana Point beach has four times the number of sharks in Newport beach, there are {multiplier_dana_point}*{sharks_newport_beach} = <<{multiplier_dana_point}*{sharks_newport_beach}={sharks_dana_point}>>{sharks_dana_point} sharks at Dana Point.
In total, the two beaches have {sharks_dana_point}+{sharks_newport_beach} = <<{sharks_dana_point}+{sharks_newport_beach}={total_sharks}>>{total_sharks} sharks
